SEARCH
Package nn.losses

Class BCELoss

java.lang.Object
nn.losses.Loss
nn.losses.CrossEntropyLoss
nn.losses.BCELoss
public class BCELoss extends CrossEntropyLoss
Implements Binary Cross-Entropy (BCE) Loss, which is typically used for binary classification problems. This loss function measures the performance of a classification model whose output is a probability value between 0 and 1.

    • calculate_loss

      public Value calculate_loss(MultiDimObject input, MultiDimObject target)
      Calculates the binary cross-entropy loss between the predicted outputs and actual targets.
      Overrides:
      calculate_loss in class CrossEntropyLoss
      Parameters:
      input - The predicted outputs from the model as a Matrix, typically representing probabilities.
      target - The actual target outputs as a Matrix, typically representing binary labels.
      Returns:
      A Value representing the computed binary cross-entropy loss.
